privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At Carteron Industries, we highly value the protection of your personal data and privacy.
privacy.section1_text:
We only collect the information strictly necessary for the site's operation and to handle your requests via our contact form (name, email address, message, etc.).
No data is shared with third parties without your consent.
privacy.section2_text:
Our site does not use cookies for tracking, advertising, or analytics purposes.
Only technical cookies essential for the site's proper functioning may be used.
privacy.section3_text:
The information you send via the contact form is only used to respond to your inquiries.
It is not sold or used for commercial purposes.
privacy.section4_text: We implement all necessary measures to ensure the security of your data.
privacy.section5_text: In accordance with applicable regulations, you have the right to access, correct, and delete your personal data. To exercise these rights, contact us at: ton-email@domaine.com
privacy.section6_text: This privacy policy may be updated at any time. We encourage you to check it regularly.

privacy_banner: We do not collect any personal data for commercial or advertising purposes. Your privacy is respected.

carousel.side_desc: Driven by innovation, Carteron Industries creates solutions at the crossroads of sport, family, and technology. We believe in making golf more accessible, comfortable, and inclusive for every generation.
carousel.about_intro: Carteron Industries represents a modern vision of agriculture and mobility. Founded on systems engineering expertise, the company develops intelligent solutions for the agricultural world and outdoor leisure. We believe in useful, sustainable technology adapted to field realities.
carousel.about_parcours: PhD engineer in electronics and physics, Lamia Carteron founded Carteron Industries after more than 15 years of R&D experience in optimizing thermal, hybrid, electric vehicles and agricultural machinery. She has collaborated with major names in the automotive industry and agricultural sector. Today, she puts her expertise at the service of an innovative solution in the leisure domain, the result of a unique combination between her passion for automotive engineering, her love for golf and her family life.

innovation.name: Next-Gen Electric Golf Trolleys
innovation.desc: Redefine your game on the course.
innovation.popup: Lightweight, foldable, and smart. Our connected electric trolleys feature integrated navigation to elevate your golf experience—delivering premium performance at a fraction of the cost.

startup.name: 2-in-1 Hybrid Trolley
startup.popup: A unique concept combining a golf bag carrier with a stroller design. Under development, this hybrid solution is built for active parents who don’t want to compromise.

work.name: Performance & Productivity
work.popup: From course to field, we design solutions that optimize efficiency, ensuring you get more out of every day.

tech.name: Tech-Driven Mobility
tech.popup: Connected tools and smart mobility systems that merge technology with golf and agriculture for a truly modern experience.

card1.title: Agricultural System Engineering
card1.desc: We support agricultural manufacturers and equipment suppliers in the design, development, and optimization of their technical systems. Our approach relies on systems engineering, functional analysis, and field expertise to ensure robust, sustainable, and profitable solutions.

card2.title: Web & Mobile Apps for Agricultural Weighing
card2.desc: Our digital solution allows logging and managing weighing operations via intuitive interfaces connected to tractors with front loaders. Optimize your logistics, save time, and enjoy full traceability.

card3.title: Electric Golf Trolleys
card3.desc: Designed for demanding golfers, our electric trolleys combine performance, range, and ergonomics. Developed with silent motors and intuitive navigation, they enhance the experience on the green.

card4.title: 2-in-1 Stroller & Golf Trolley Hybrid
card4.desc: A unique innovation: a hybrid trolley designed for active parents, combining the functionality of a stroller and a motorized golf cart. Perfect to balance sport and family without compromise.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find out everything you need to know about our 2-in-1 electric golf trolley stroller.

faq1.q: What exactly does CARTERON Industries offer?
faq1.a: We are developing a 2-in-1 electric golf trolley stroller: a unique piece of equipment that safely carries both golf clubs, accessories, and a baby seat.

faq2.q: Why combine a golf trolley and a stroller?
faq2.a: Because golfing parents want to enjoy their passion without compromise. Our solution allows you to play golf while keeping your child close by, effortlessly and safely.

faq3.a:
It’s the first time a hybrid solution—motorized, lightweight, and secure—has been designed to unite sports leisure with family life.
- Electric motorization with speed control on slopes.
- Robust yet lightweight structure, easy to fold.
- Quick transformation between golf trolley mode and stroller mode.

faq4.q: What are the benefits for users?
faq4.a:
- Comfort: no more carrying a heavy golf bag and bulky stroller.
- Health: prevents fatigue and pain (back, shoulders).
- Family: allows parents to enjoy quality time with their children.
- Simplicity: easy folding and transport, battery life for a full round (18 holes or more).

faq5.q: Is it safe for the baby?
faq5.a:
Yes. Safety is our top priority:
- Baby seat compliant with childcare standards.
- Stable design with efficient motor brake.
- Simple and reliable controls for speed management.
- Tested in collaboration with partner golf clubs.

faq6.q: Do golf clubs allow this type of equipment?
faq6.a: Yes, many clubs see this type of family innovation positively, especially outside peak hours. Organizations such as the Australian PGA and England Golf already support similar initiatives.

faq7.a: Our goal is to deliver great value for money: more affordable than buying both a premium trolley and a high-end stroller separately. Different ranges will be available depending on needs (families, regular golfers, occasional players).

faq8.a:
- Golfing parents who want to keep playing without giving up family time.
- Golf clubs looking to attract a new family-oriented clientele.
- Senior golfers who want to share their passion with children or grandchildren.

faq9.a: Because the project is led by Lamia Carteron, PhD engineer with 15 years of R&D experience in the automotive and agricultural machinery sectors. Her technical expertise, combined with her passion for golf and family life, ensures a reliable, innovative product designed down to the finest detail.

faq10.q: When will the product be available?
faq10.a: We are currently preparing the development and testing phase. Market launch is planned after prototype validation and safety certification.

steps.title: Innovation, Step by Step
steps.description: Discover how Carteron Industries is reinventing golf with a unique 2-in-1 electric stroller trolley, designed for parents who love the game.

step1.title: 1. Carry Everything with Ease
step1.desc: Transport your golf clubs, equipment, and your baby safely in one lightweight, robust structure.

step2.title: 2. Smart Electric Assistance
step2.desc: Motorized drive, stable speed control uphill and downhill, and long-lasting battery autonomy for a full round.

step3.title: 3. Safety & Comfort First
step3.desc: Secure seat for your baby, easy folding system, stable brakes, and ergonomic handling for peace of mind.

step4.title: 4. Family-Friendly Golf
step4.desc: Play golf without compromise — share your passion with your child while enjoying a unique, innovative experience.
